SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Net Profit Margin?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Net Profit Margin is ROI

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Net Profit Margin?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Net Profit Margin is Customer Retention Rate.

SRP.Q: On the Current Ratio, is the point for Davies, Gutierrez and Jones inside or outside the point for Sosa Inc?
SRP.A: On the Current Ratio, the point for Davies, Gutierrez and Jones is inside the point for Sosa Inc.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Current Ratio} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Sosa Inc?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Current Ratio}, while the weakest aspect is{ Net Profit Margin}.

VPR.Q: On dimension Current Ratio, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Current Ratio, label {Davies, Gutierrez and Jones} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Customer Retention Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Customer Retention Rate, label {Sosa Inc} scores the lowest.

NC.Q: For Davies, Gutierrez and Jones, which dimension has a higher score: Current Ratio or ROI?
NC.A: {Current Ratio} has a higher score than ROI for Davies, Gutierrez and Jones.

NC.Q: For Sosa Inc, which dimension has a higher score: Customer Retention Rate or Net Profit Margin?
NC.A: {Customer Retention Rate} has a higher score than Net Profit Margin for Sosa Inc.

NC.A: {Sosa Inc} has a higher score on Current Ratio compared to Davies, Gutierrez and Jones.

NC.Q: On Net Profit Margin, which label has a higher score: Sosa Inc or the Davies, Gutierrez and Jones?
NC.A: {Davies, Gutierrez and Jones} has a higher score on Net Profit Margin compared to Sosa Inc.

MSR.Q: For Davies, Gutierrez and Jones, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: Davies, Gutierrez and Jones most needs to improve its {ROI}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the strongest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the strongest overall capability is {Davies, Gutierrez and Jones}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the weaknest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the weaknest overall capability is {Sosa Inc}.
